dt-api.name: searchPanes.rebuild()
dt-api.summary: Rebuild all of the panes, regathering options from the table.

type.description: Rebuild all of the panes, regathering options from the table.

dt-api.description:
This method preovides the ability to rebuild the panes should a change occur on the associated DataTable. As the method purely recreates the pane, it has no need for a return.
No arguments are to be provided to `-init searchPanes.rebuild()`. When this is called all of the panes will be rebuilt, in effect this is the same as running `-init searchPanes.rebuildPane()`.
